## ICache interface

Represents cached resolutions interface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICache 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [instance](./typeioc.icache.instance.md) | <code>{</code><br/><code>        [name: string]: any;</code><br/><code>    }</code> | Retrieves resolution interface directly via name. Returns service resolution instance or undefined if no resolution found |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [resolve(name)](./typeioc.icache.resolve.md) | Resolves an instance of a service |

## Remarks

Resolutions could be retrieved by name. The value of the name is computed as follows (from highest to lowest priority):

1. `name` parameter for `cache` method specified during resolution.

2. `name` parameter used for named registrations.

3. service parameter representing an object with a `name` property.

4. service parameter represent a string object
